data.name: auxfeekeyid
data.description: AuxFee KeyID, the hash160 of the address used where fees are paid out to. Should be P2WPKH

data.name: auxfees
data.description: Details of the auxiliary fees that must be paid for each transaction

data.name: bound
data.description: Lower bound from which the given auxiliary fee percentage begins

data.name: percent
data.description: Percentage fee that must be paid when a transaction's value is above the given bound (percentages are cumulative)
